summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a state-of-the-art device with a 5.7 inch display, 16MP rear camera, 8MP front camera, and 128GB of internal storage. It also has features such as a fingerprint scanner, dual-SIM card slot, AI assistant, and facial recognition technology. The phone is available for $599.99 USD and includes taxes and fees, as well as free shipping within the continental United States. Contoso Wireless also offers 24/7 customer support, a 1-year warranty on all their phones, and a wide selection of accessories. Customers can purchase the phone online or at one of their retail stores, or they can call to place an order over the phone.
